settings.heading: Sign up today
settings.subheading: Sign up today and earn 200 points for free!
settings.content:
Be rewarded for the bag addict you are!

Join our FREE Loyalty Program designed to reward you, our Favourite customers!

Gain access to rewards, special offers, exclusive events and company intel.

settings.heading: How to earn points
settings.subheading: START EARNING REWARDS WHEN YOU JOIN. EARN POINTS AND RECEIVE DISCOUNT VOUCHERS FOR YOUR NEXT PURCHASE.

settings.heading: Refer your friends
settings.subheading: Share your link to give your friend a € 5 voucher to spend on their first purchase.
settings.content: When they make a purchase you’ll receive a € 5 voucher!

settings.heading: Get rewards
settings.subheading: Start earning great rewards when you join. Earn points and receive discount vouchers for your next purchase.*
settings.content:
Voucher €5 discount - 500 points

Voucher €10 discount - 1000 points

Voucher €15 discount - 1500 points

Voucher €20 discount - 2000

points Voucher €25 discount - 2500 points
settings.extra_txt:
* €5 and €10 voucher is only valid for orders above €30.
€15 & €20 voucher is only valid for orders above €50.
€25 voucher is only valid for orders above €75.
